backend/main.mo: Main actor implementing a chatroom system with messages, user profiles, reactions, access control, blob storage, and HTTP outcalls; includes migration support and functions for archiving/unarchiving chatrooms with admin password protection.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that transforms old chatroom data structure to new structure by adding 'archived' (defaulting to false) and 'lastMessageTimestamp' fields while preserving all other state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting five implemented features for archived chatrooms: /archive route, useQuery hook for fetching archived rooms, visual archived badges, disabled UI interactions in archived rooms, and navigation links to the archive page.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend components and pages, describing routing, query hooks, UI components for chat/lobby/archive, message handling, media embeds, profile setup, styling, and admin functionality.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with cache-busting meta tags, mobile viewport configuration, and versioned script tag (v=203) to force production refresh.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component with TanStack Router setup defining routes for lobby, chatroom, archive, and admin pages; conditionally renders header/footer (hidden on admin pages) and includes 404 handling.
frontend/src/components/AvatarPickerDial: Dialog component for selecting user avatars via file upload, Giphy search/trending GIFs, or removal; includes debounced search, request tracking to prevent race conditions, and avatar update mutations.
frontend/src/components/ChatArea.tsx: Main chat interface component that displays messages, handles message sending with media/replies, manages auto-scrolling, and includes a collapsible header with chatroom details and pinned video support.
frontend/src/components/ChatroomCard.tsx: Card component displaying chatroom preview with thumbnail (YouTube/Twitch/Twitter/image), topic, description, live/archived badges, and stats (messages, users, views).
frontend/src/components/CreateChatroomDi: Dialog for creating chatrooms with topic, description, category selection, and media upload options (image upload, YouTube/Twitch video URLs, or Twitter post embeds with preview).
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer component displaying copyright notice and attribution to caffeine.ai with a heart icon.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: App header with logo, navigation (back button for chatroom/archive views), editable username with validation (alphanumeric, 15 char max), avatar picker, and archive button.
frontend/src/components/LoginPrompt.tsx: Intentional no-op placeholder component that renders nothing, with comments explicitly stating authentication is not used in this anonymous app.
frontend/src/components/MessageBubble.ts: Message display component with avatar, timestamp, media rendering (YouTube/Twitch/Twitter/images/voice), emoji reactions, pin/unpin functionality, and reply support with scroll-to-message capability.
frontend/src/components/MessageInput.tsx: Message input component with support for text messages, image uploads, voice recording, Giphy integration, and auto-detection of YouTube/Twitch/Twitter URLs. Includes progress tracking, error handling, and debounced search for GIFs.
frontend/src/components/PinnedVideo.tsx: Component that displays a pinned video (YouTube or Twitch) with an unpin button. Renders embedded iframes for supported video platforms.
frontend/src/components/VoiceMessagePlay: Audio player component for voice messages with play/pause controls, waveform visualization, progress slider, and time display. Handles playback synchronization to pause other audio when playing.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that manages the backend actor instance, creating authenticated or anonymous actors based on Internet Identity state and invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebouncedValue.ts: Custom hook that returns a debounced version of a value after a specified delay, useful for optimizing search inputs and API calls.
frontend/src/hooks/useForceFreshChatroom: Hook that ensures chatrooms are freshly fetched when the actor becomes ready by purging legacy cache entries, detecting persisted empty arrays, and forcing a refetch with recovery state tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout flow, identity persistence, and authentication status with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for chatroom and message operations including CRUD operations, search, reactions, and user profile management. Handles local storage for username/userId, list-to-array conversions, and image compression for uploads.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light/dark themes, mobile-specific input styles to prevent iOS zoom, and custom voice message range input styling.
frontend/src/lib/config.ts: Frontend configuration constants for Giphy API integration (API key and result limit).
frontend/src/lib/formatters.ts: Utility function to format numbers with compact notation (k, M, B) for display purposes.
frontend/src/lib/giphy.ts: Giphy API integration for searching and fetching trending GIFs with error handling and result mapping.
frontend/src/lib/html2canvasLoader.ts: Empty file, likely a placeholder for html2canvas dynamic import functionality.
frontend/src/lib/imageCompression.ts: Client-side image compression utility that resizes and compresses images while preserving orientation, with configurable quality and dimensions, skipping GIFs and SVGs.
frontend/src/lib/twitterEmbedRenderer.ts: Empty file, likely a placeholder for Twitter embed rendering functionality.
frontend/src/lib/twitterOEmbedPreview.ts: Fetches Twitter oEmbed JSON data and extracts preview fields (author, text, image) with caching and request deduplication to avoid CORS issues.
frontend/src/lib/twitterOEmbedPreviewCac: localStorage cache manager for Twitter oEmbed preview data with validation, expiration (7 days), and versioning support.
frontend/src/lib/twitterThumbnail.ts: Empty file, likely a placeholder for Twitter thumbnail generation functionality.
frontend/src/lib/twitterThumbnailCache.t: Empty file, likely a placeholder for Twitter thumbnail caching functionality.
frontend/src/lib/videoUtils.ts: Utility functions for extracting video IDs and generating thumbnail/embed URLs for YouTube, Twitch (clips, VODs, live streams), and Twitter/X posts.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDeleteChatroomsP: Admin page with password authentication for managing and deleting chatrooms, featuring search, filtering, and bulk deletion capabilities.
frontend/src/pages/ArchivePage.tsx: Displays archived chatrooms with search and category filtering functionality, allowing users to browse inactive rooms.
frontend/src/pages/ChatroomPage.tsx: Individual chatroom page that loads chatroom data, increments view count, and renders the ChatArea component with error handling.
frontend/src/pages/LobbyPage.tsx: Main lobby page displaying active chatrooms with search, category filtering, and navigation to create new chats or view archives.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom color scheme using OKLCH, extended theme properties, animations, and typography/container plugins.
project_state.json: Project state tracking file for an anonymous 4chan-style chatroom app with 77-room lobby limit, automatic archiving based on activity scoring, and read-only archived rooms. Contains architectural notes, existing features (archive page, UI indicators, read-only controls), and pending feature requests for implementing the bumping/archiving system.
